column5: the ------military police force of Preah Sihanouk province raided a Chinese entertainment club located on  independence road
column6: near Golden Lion Circle.------Royal Gendarmerie forces and provincial police forces co-operated to crack down on drug offenses at the Tai Yien Yi Club. 11 Chinese men and women
column8: along with some drugs.------ Preah Sihanouk Provincial Court is preparing some space for the group.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/257751
